name: The Golden Egg of a Nation
description: 02/03 of "Flatlands". Flatlands is a serie of 3D rendered images depicting some absurd neoliberal viewpoints, like the lunatical idea of the planet Earth as a flat surface. This piece is composed by multiple satellite images from native indians territories in Brazil, taken via Google Earth and morphed into multiple dimensions. | Gabriel Babolim. 2021.
